mods.abstract: Ran Away From the plantation of Mrs. Bowles, a negro man named GILBERT, aged about 30 years, middle height, dark griffe, has rather a downcast look when spoken to; said negro man is presumed to be lurking about the neighborhood of Judge Simon's plantation. A suitable reward will be paid for his apprehension and delivery to the subscriber. A. L. FIELDS, Curator. Parish of St. Mary, Oct. 9 1852.-tf.

detail.title: The Planters' banner. : (Franklin, Attakapas Co., Lou.) 1849-1872
